MOD.CVS.name: Club Design
MOD.CVS.description: In this Module, the user is guided to: 1) identify what characteristics in a design add value to the stakeholders, and 2) evaluate the value of different design alternatives, assessed both in engineering terms as well as in monetary terms. This can enable more efficient communication with decision-makers.

MOD.MDAC.name: Multidisciplinary Analysis Client
MOD.MDAC.description: Visualization interface used to visualize and interact with multidisciplinary data.

MOD.MORPH.name: Morpheus
MOD.MORPH.description: Morphological matrix tool. This tool is used to create morphological matrices, which are used to explore the design space of a problem. Constraints can be added to the design space, and solutions can be generated using different strategies.
